name: What a Masterpiece!
description:
An painter painting a very expensive painting. when suddently he sneezes and ruins the painting.

While he throws a trauntum, that little mistake starts moving on its own. Using the lines and shapes as platforms.

A misterious voice keeps guiding the little mistake. The voice is trying to make the people who look at his painting say: What a masterpiece!

Made in 48 hours for the Paint Game Jam.

By official:

Music: Granny Smith OST - Factory

POST IN THE COMMENTS IF YOU COMPLETED AAL THE 9 LEVELS

All levels are possible, I spent hours testing each one, so yes, it is possible to beat this game.
